title: Invert Object
description: In this lab, we will explore how to invert an object's key-value pairs without mutating the original object. We will use the `Object.keys()` method and `Array.prototype.reduce()` to invert the object. Additionally, we will learn how to apply a function to the inverted keys and return an array of keys responsible for generating the inverted value.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
